:locale.description: Internationalization configuration to override the datePicker field in locale
:locale.description_zh: 国际化配置，用于覆盖locale中的 datePicker 字段

hide-trigger.description: There are no trigger elements, only the selection panel is displayed
hide-trigger.description_zh: 没有触发元素，只显示选择面板

error.description: Whether it is in an error state

size.description: The size of the date picker

:shortcuts.description: Preset time range for quick selection
:shortcuts.description_zh: 预设时间范围快捷选择

shortcuts-position.description: The position of the preset range on the panel, which is placed below by default, and the side is generally used for scenes with a large number of preset times
shortcuts-position.description_zh: 预设范围在面板上的位置，默认放在下方，侧边一般用于大量预设时间的场景

position.type: top / tl / tr / bottom / bl / br
position.description: The position of the pop-up box

popup-visible.description: Controls whether the pop-up box is turned on or off
popup-visible.description_zh: 控制弹出框的打开或者关闭状态

default-popup-visible.description: The default pop-up box is enabled or disabled
default-popup-visible.description_zh: 默认弹出框是打开或者关闭

trigger-props.description: You can pass in the parameters of the Trigger component
trigger-props.description_zh: 可以传入 Trigger 组件的参数

unmount-on-close.description: Whether to destroy the DOM structure when hidden
unmount-on-close.description_zh: 是否在隐藏的时候销毁DOM结构

disabled-time.description: The time that cannot be selected

v-model:picker-value.description: The date displayed by the panel

default-picker-value.description: The date that the panel displays by default

preview-shortcut.description: Whether you want to preview the results of the shortcut selection
preview-shortcut.description_zh: 是否要预览快捷选择的结果

show-confirm-btn.description: Whether or not to display the confirmation button, showTime = true is always displayed.
show-confirm-btn.description_zh: 是否显示确认按钮，showTime = true 的时候始终显示。

disabled-input.description: Whether to prohibit the date from being entered on the keyboard
disabled-input.description_zh: 是否禁止键盘输入日期

format.description: For the format of the display date, refer to the string parsing format
format.description_zh: 展示日期的格式，参考字符串解析格式

value-format.description: The format of the value is valid for value defaultValue pickerValue defaultPickerValue and the return value in the event, which can be set to timestamp, Date and string (refer to the string parsing format).
value-format.description_zh: 值的格式，对 value defaultValue pickerValue defaultPickerValue 以及事件中的返回值生效，支持设置为时间戳，Date 和字符串（参考字符串解析格式）。

events.name: change
events.params: value: Date | string | number | undefineddate: Date | undefineddateString: string | undefined

events.name: select
events.description: The selected date has changed, but the component value has not changed
events.description_zh: 选中日期发生改变但组件值未改变
events.params: value: Date | string | numberdate: DatedateString: string

events.name: popup-visible-change
events.description: Turn the pop-up box on or off

events.name: ok
events.params: value: Date | string | numberdate: DatedateString: string

events.name: picker-value-change
events.params: value: Date | string | numberdate: DatedateString: string

ShortcutType.name: value
ShortcutType.type: (Date | string | number) | (Date | string | number)[] | (() => (Date | string | number) | (Date | string | number)[])

ShortcutType.name: format
ShortcutType.description: 解析值所使用的格式，参考字符串解析格式

slots.name: cell
slots.description: 自定义日期单元格的内容
slots.description_zh: 自定义日期单元格的内容
